CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 04-01-2018, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: bp Dsl 2018/KER/286 Cr1.MC.No. 8933 of 2016 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' EXHIBITS ANNEXURE I COPY OF THE COMPLAINT DATED 16-6-2014. ANNEXURE IT THE CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIRST INFORMATION REPORT IN CRIME NO.915/2014 OF TIRUR POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE IIT TRUE COPY OF THE SEARCH LIST DATED 17-06-2014. ANNEXURE IV TRUE COPY OF THE AGREEMENT DATED 11-06-2013. ANNEXURE V CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN C.C.NO.2411/2014 DATED 20-10-2014. RESPONDENT'S ANNEXURES : NIL. / {TRUE COPY// P.A. TO JUDGE bp B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 4"" day of January, 2018 ORDER Petitioners are A1 and A2 in CC No.2411/2014 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court, Tirur based on Annexure-V final report in Crime No.915/2014 of Tirur Police Station, for the offences punishable under Sections 3 and 7 read with Section 17 of the Kerala Money Lenders Act, 1958, and Section 9(a) of the Kerala Prohibition of Charging Exorbitant Interest Act, 2012. 2. On hearing either side, it has come out that the present stage is too premature to consider the arguments forwarded by the learned counsel for the petitioners. At the same time, the said matters can be considered by the court below at the stage of Section 239 Cr.P.C., in case such Ae) ap ate os 2018/KER/286 Crl.M.C.8933/2016 22: stage is not over. Without prejudice to the right of the petitioners to take up all these contentions before the court below at the stage of Section 239 Cr.P.C., in case such stage is not over, or during trial before the trial court, this Crl.M.C. is disposed of. Sd/- (B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE) aks/04/01 // True Copy // PS to Judge
